forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 8 to 14 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight envelops Downtown San Francisco, the evening air feels weighty yet refreshing, brushing against the skin with a gentle coolness that whispers of the maritime embrace nearby. Tonight, the sky unfolds in a mostly clear panorama, save for hints of the lingering marine layer tracing the skyline, evoking a tranquil allure against the city lights. The west-southwest breeze carries a playful whisper, dancing softly between 8 to 14 mph, a fitting prelude to the crispness of the evening that settles around 59 degrees.

Tomorrow promises to dawn brightly, with a forecast of mostly sunny skies and a high reaching into the comfortable embrace of 68 degrees. Expect the winds to pick up, swaying through the streets at 7 to 21 mph, with occasional gusts that could surprise those not prepared for the playful breath of autumn days on the horizon. Layering is wise this evening; a light sweater or jacket will suit the unpredictable whims of the wind and chill of the night. An afternoon stroll through the parks or a leisurely visit to a local café, perhaps moving leisurely along the waterfront, is a perfect way to soak in the sun while the inviting summer glow still lingers. If adventure calls, consider a nighttime exploration of the city’s illuminated streets, where the vibrance of urban life remains alive. How delightful the night beckons, a reminder that every corner of the city tells its own story, waiting to be discovered anew.
